00035 // TODO: get rid of this MaxAPI include when we get rid of the defer_low() call
00036 #include "ext.h"
00037 
00038 static void delete_functionunit(FunctionUnit* functionUnit)
00039 {
00040         delete functionUnit;
00041         functionUnit = NULL;
00042 }
00043 
00044 JamomaError FunctionLib::createUnit(const TTSymbol& unitName, FunctionUnit **unit)
00045 {
00046         FunctionUnit* oldUnit = NULL;
00047         FunctionUnit* newUnit = NULL;
00048         
00049         if(*unit){
00050                 TTSymbol& existingFunctionName = (*unit)->getName();
00051                 if(unitName == existingFunctionName)
00052                         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00053                 else
00054                         oldUnit = *unit;
00055         }
00056 
00057         // These should be alphabetized
00058         if(unitName == TT("cosine"))
00059                 newUnit = (FunctionUnit*) new CosineFunction;
00060         else if(unitName == TT("linear"))
00061                 newUnit = (FunctionUnit*) new LinearFunction;
00062         else if(unitName == TT("lowpass"))
00063                 newUnit = (FunctionUnit*) new LowpassFunction;
00064         else if(unitName == TT("power"))
00065                 newUnit = (FunctionUnit*) new PowerFunction;
00066         else if(unitName == TT("tanh"))
00067                 newUnit = (FunctionUnit*) new TanhFunction;
00068         else{
00069                 // Invalid function specified default to linear
00070 //              TTLogError("rampLib: Invalid function: %s", (TTString)unitName);
00071                 TTLogError("rampLib: Invalid function", (TTString)unitName);
00072                 newUnit = (FunctionUnit*) new LinearFunction;
00073         }
00074         
00075         *unit = newUnit;
00076         if(oldUnit){
00077                 // We can't sleep the main thread. So this is futile:
00078                 //      TTThread::sleep(100);
00079                 //      delete oldUnit;
00080                 // TTQueue is not all ironed out just yet.  We should use that... 
00081                 // Maybe through a delay on the TTScheduler, which isn't written at all.
00082                 // So we'll use this nasty hack in the Max API to delete the old unit safely:
00083                 defer_low(NULL, (method)delete_functionunit, (t_symbol*)oldUnit, 0, NULL);
00084         }
00085         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void FunctionLib::getUnitNames(TTValue& unitNames)
00090 {
00091         unitNames.clear();
00092         unitNames.append(TT("cosine"));
00093         unitNames.append(TT("linear"));
00094         unitNames.append(TT("lowpass"));
00095         unitNames.append(TT("power"));
00096         unitNames.append(TT("tanh"));
00097 }
